Ski Canada Small Group Hosted Tour - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Ski Canada Small Hosted Group Tour Limited Spaces Available Embark on an unforgettable ski adventure designed with active senior travellers in mind! Join a 2025 escorted group tour, hosted by the expert duo Matt Thomson and Fiona Bannister, as they take you through the stunning slopes of SilverStar and Sun Peaks, two of Canada’s premier ski destinations. Experience the charm of these picturesque villages and enjoy skiing on some of the most varied terrains in British Columbia. Whether you prefer groomed cruisers or exploring alpine bowls, there’s something for every ability level. This tour is perfect for travellers aged 50+ who seek not only a thrilling ski experience but also a safe, social, and stress-free environment. The itinerary is very flexible, allowing you to do as much or as little with the group as you choose. Whether its deciding which ski runs to tackle, joining evening meals, drinks, or activities, the choice is entirely yours. It’s your ski holiday, with your choices, plus the fun, worry-free travel, security, and inclusive social perks that only a group journey can offer. With limited spaces available, now is the time to lock in your spot for this exceptional adventure. Don’t miss out on the opportunity to explore these beloved Canadian resorts, guided by experts who truly understand the joys of group skiing and socialising. Inclusions 7 nights accommodation at SilverStar (Snowbird Lodge or Silver Creek Lodge) 7 nights accommodation at Sun Peaks (Sun Peaks Lodge) 12 days of skiing with lift passes (6 day lift pass at each ski resort) Transfers to/from airport and inter-resort The company of your Hosts Matt Thomson and Fiona Bannister Excludes: Airfares, meals, other winter activities, insurance & ski hire* *Ski gear can be hired in the resort. If you do not have your own equipment (or do not wish to travel with it) we recommend pre-booking for your hireage requirements – and we can do this for you. There are different levels of ski equipment hire and we would recommend hiring better quality skis and equipment.
